Arizona Winter School 2014: Arithmetic Statistics

AWS 2014 was held during March 15-19, 2014 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Schedule and other important information
  • Local directions
  • Organizers: Bryden Cais and Matthew Papanikolas (main program), with Mirela Ciperiani, Rachel Pries, and Romyar Sharifi.
